actions.name: Shields Down
actions.description: Effect: While the user's HP is higher than 1/2 their Max HP, the user is in Meteor Forme. While in Meteor Forme, the user is immune to Status Afflictions. When the user's HP is less than 1/2 their Max HP, they chance to Core Forme. While in Core Forme, the user is unaffected by negative stage effects.
